[h1] 闲着没事吸一吸猫娘	[/h1]

键鼠操作方法：按住鼠标调整视角，数字键1-8调整相机位置。Q键和Shift键对没有VR设备的玩家没有什么意义的样子。

[h1]分辨率调整方法	[/h1]

有两首曲子可以欣赏，默认分辨率720P，可以打开游戏文件夹找到“ネコぱらいぶ☆”文件，右键编辑打开，第一个数值改成1920，第二个数值改成1080，保存后退出，应该就可以1080P观看了

31019975.review:
NEKOPALIVE is a free 3D concert performance game with VR support added.  It worked on Win 10 with monitor, looked ok, played ok, sounded good.  Has 2 different songs and dance performances on the same 3D stage for the same two Catgirl characters in maid costumes of Nekopara: Coconut and Azuki.  Nothing sexual about this game, just might see up skirt panty shots and  top shots of Coconut's rack

 In screen mode, You can use your mouse to move your point of focus 360 degrees around your fixed position.  You can use numbers 1 to 8 keys for different camera positions in the audience. Key Q does something at twitter.  

The buttons are not translated, except for Exit and Twitter.  Has two buttons that are for the 2 Screen performances only. Also have two buttons for performances in VR mode of the same 2 songs, they are greyed out if you don't have VR headset.  There is a twitter button that you might hit also, allows the game to do something with your twitter account.  There is no help or options buttons.  You can set the monitor size by command line launch options.  The song lagged when in high screen size and checking camera positions.  Has xbox controller support, does the same as keyboard mouse.

Edit 28 Dec 2017  Got a Vive VR HMD, the Nekopalive does Not work Out of the Box with it, at this edit.  Check the forum for workarounds to view in VR.  The graphics might not be as good using VR as playing on a monitor. 

How to make it work in VR, found a way to make it boot so it will show the VR buttons not greyed out.

go to C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\NEKOPALIVE\Package\Nekopara\Binaries\Win64 open nekopalive.exe with steam vr running in the background, it will now show the starting screen with the vr buttons enabled, but if you click the buttons on your desktop they wont work.
go in steamVR and change to view your desktop and click the vr button there, it will now start the song in VR!

Try it if you like anime girls dancing on stage or fans of Nekopara anime and VNs

28204614.review:
[i]游戏流程大概几十分钟，写篇偏指南的评测[/i]
[h1][b]( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)先是大家关心的问题：左边白色右边黑色[/b][/h1]
下面“认真”说一下游戏：
[list]
    [*]免费VR猫；没什么好说的...好评
    [*]VR模式下建模略显粗糙
    [*]不能直接通过VR界面开启游戏，只能剧院模式运行游戏；再进入桌面选择VR模式
    [*]背景像是小歌舞厅..游戏有2首歌..游戏背景还是不错的
    [*]舞台默认是高于地面的，所以即使走过去也不能和椰子再同一高度
→站在舞台的方法；开启游戏时记得蹲下..这样根据头盔的位置，生成的舞台就和地面基本平行；这样就能看椰子身高到底多少
[/list]
[h1] 个人觉得蛮重要的地方：[/h1]
虽然是免费游戏，但还是希望能支持VIVE手柄呀；现阶段是不支持的；希望能做成跟台下一样的支援棒，看的时候能跟着摇一摇；代入感更强呀...

[b][u]推荐最佳游玩方式：[/u][/b]
打开游戏后，盘腿坐下观看，找一个合适的位置（能吻合台下的支援棒），然后把你的手柄当成支援棒根据游戏里的摆动。代入感最佳。

[b]补充：无VR的玩家如何更改视角[/b]
普通模式下可利用手柄更改玩家视角(XBOX手柄为例)；插入手柄启动游戏：十字键可更换视角位置；右摇杆可旋转视角；按住RT可显示可选择移动的视角位置。
(备注：由xbox手柄测试；不确定其他手柄能否使用)

PS：
感觉椰子也不高呀....(⊙﹏⊙)
这样也算评测吗？好吧，应该也算

25485870.review:
This is a cute and fun way to gain just little bit more exposure to the lovely series that is Nekopara. For what it's worth, the game is pretty good quality, considering that it is totally free. In addition, the whole experience takes up about 10 minutes of your time, so you don't need to worry about friends or family walking in on you gawking at your neko waifus.

[b]Despite all that, I personally would have liked to have seen much more content, including:[/b]

[olist]
[*][u]More girls.[/u] The game only features Azuki and Coconut as dancers, but it would have been cool to have seen Chocola and Vanilla or even Cinnamon and Maple on stage, too.
[*][u]More outfits.[/u] Why were the performance outfits featured on the promotional wallpaper not implemented?
[*][u]More songs.[/u] You can only play the two theme songs from Nekopara Vol. 2, even though Vol. 1 had its own theme songs, as well.
[/olist]

In the end, this is really just a bit of fun aimed at the fans of Nekopara. If you enjoyed the main series (because seriously, who didn't?) then I definitely recommend checking out NekopaLive.

24647111.review:
なぜかどこにも書いていないのですが、VRモードの起動方法について記載します。
VR対応を大々的に謳っていますが、普通に起動してもVRモードにはなりません。
VRmodeと記載されたボタンもグレーアウトします。

1.まずはsteamのVR以外の一般ゲームを起動する
2.その後、NEKOPALIVEを起動する
3.「1」で起動したゲームを終了する
4.NEKOPALIVEで「ve mode」ボタンが現れるので、クリックする

これで初めてVive側にVR映像が投影されます。
明らかにバグっぽいのですが、修正されないですね。

24631177.review:
네코 파라 시리즈의 VR 컨텐츠인 네코파라이브입니다.

이번에는 네코(고양이) + 파라-다이스-(낙원) + 라이브(실황 공연)의 세 단어를 조합한 제목이며 단어 그대로 인간 여캐의 모습을 한 고양이들이 무대로 기어올라가서 공연하는 것을 VR 및 일반 모니터로 관람하는 단순한 VR 지원 프로그램입니다.

원래 만우절 장난이였다가 반응을 보고 급히 만들어진 것이기 때문에 곡이 두곡밖에 없고 무대에 올라가서 날뛰는 여캐도 두명뿐인 단점이 있긴 하지만 요즘 현실에서도 점점 빈도수가 많아지고 있는 눈깔괴물 여캐 홀로그램 무대를 수많은 남성들이 열광하며 관람하는 토테미즘 의식 비슷한 모습을 360도로 관람할수 있기 때문에 VR 공포체험의 초기 작품으로 충분한 가치를 한다고 생각하며 심약자는 관람을 삼가해주시기 바랍니다.

24002435.review:
ただ歌って踊るのを眺めるだけですが、単機能ゆえにストレスも一切ありません。
VRに求めていたのはこういうことだったのかと納得してしまいました。
元のゲームは知りませんが、ふと手が空くと起動してしまいます。
こういった作品が増えると嬉しいですね。

※OculusRiftで動かす場合、起動手順があるようなので追記しておきます。
1.音量を絞る（デフォルトがかなり大きい）
2.SteamVRをOffにしておく（もしOnの状態でStartした場合、VRにならない）
3.OculusStoreを立ち上げておく（しない場合、たまに起動が遅れて変な動作になる）
4.通常のモニター上でNekoPaLiveを起動し、各楽曲のVRmodeを選択
以上です。
視点変更は、XboxPadでABXYボタンがそれぞれ割り振られています。

23973798.review:
オキュラスリフトを買ったは良かったが、正直に言って私はVRデバイスをもて余していた。
どんなゲームをやっても酔ってしまう。
現実では座っているのにVR内の分身は動き回っているというギャップに、脳が追い付かないのだ。

そんな私にとってこのゲームとの出会いは、まさに運命の出会いであったと言っても過言ではない。

このNEKOPALIVE、ライブが始まってしまえば一切移動する必要がなく、その場で観ているだけでいい。
酔わないように気を付けながらキャラを動かすといったムダに気を配ることなく、目の前で踊っている可愛い女の子たちに100%集中できる。
また、気まぐれに目線を振って、ステージのディテールを楽しむのも良い。

目の前にいる一見無表情ながらも時折笑顔を見せながら踊る女の子は、一体どういう人生を歩んできたのだろうと、
彼女の人格形成の要因に想いを馳せてる自分がいることに気付いたときは、ここまで入り込めるかと非常に驚いたものだ。
（原作を未プレイなため、キャラの詳細を知らない）


さて、そんなVR体験を与えてくれる素晴らしきNEKOPALIVEにも、まだまだ越えるべき障壁がある。
楽曲を選択するメニューがVRに対応していないため、
ライブの合間にいちいち現実世界に引き戻されるのだ。
（逆にライブっぽさが増して、VR体験の一部であるという考え方もできるかもしれないが……）

そういった点も踏まえて、
このNEKOPALIVEは、ぜひおすすめしたい作品である。

23596824.review:
이걸 VR로 어떻게...?
라는 생각이 제일 많이 들었습니다.

일단 게임은 아니고... 기본적으로 두 가지 노래가 있으며 그 노래에 맞춰 어색하게 춤추는 두 명의 네코미미 웨이트리스를 구경합니다. 신작에 맞춰서인지 신 캐릭터 두 명이 춤추는 것만 구경할 수 있는데요. 곡 당 일반 모드와 VR모드를 선택할 수 있습니다.

일반 모드에서도 VR과 비슷한 느낌을 주게끔 마우스로 시점을 전환할 수 있습니다.

이 물건을 키면서 가장 궁금했던 건 움직이지 않고 한 곳에서 보기만 하는 것이라는 겁니다.
시점 전환을 할 수야 있겠다만 그래서야 VR로 보는 의미도 솔직히 없지 않은가? 직접 움직이며 모습을 훑어봐야 하는 것 아닌가 하고 말이죠.

그런데 VR모드로 직접 보고나니 그 생각은 기우였다는 것을 알았습니다.

정말로 신기했던 점은 단순히 스크린을 보는 것이 아니라 '진짜 앞에 있는 듯한' 느낌을 받았다는 겁니다.

아직 보유한 게임이 많지 않아서 이런 것에도 새로운 경험을 느끼는 것이겠지만 어차피 무료인 것, 한 번씩 구경해주는 것도 예의라고 생각합니다.

23426615.review:
NEKOPALIVE, a game that has been released following the previous Nekopara games, is a revolutionary creation. The game has brought Steam to a Golden Age that will last forever. A simple click of playing the game shall enlighten your life. The anatomies of cat and human come together to create this wonderful game.

Story: NEKOPALIVE is a game where one must find the perfect angles and perfect positions of one character. The character in mind would be a girl with cat ears, my personal favorite is Coconut due to her voluptuous appearance in the game. As you progress through the story, you obtain many perks. One of the advantages of progressing through the story is the advantage of using other characters such as Vanilla. The overall conclusion is that it is a very in depth story that brings tears to my eyes every time I go through the game. NEKOPALIVE has brought me, a man that uses steam for fun and games, to my knees begging for more of this beautiful storyline.

Characters: In NEKOPALIVE, the characters include everyone from the previous Nekopara games. Some fan favorites from the crew of La Soleil include Vanilla and Chocola. All characters come in different shapes and sizes. From Azuki to Coconut, players may choose the character that they most desire. The characters may be a reference to Super Smash Brothers Melee because of the fact that their sizes can relate to hitboxes of different characters. To add on to the aforementioned implication, the amount of characters to choose from in NEKOPALIVE really gives the player more gametime and fun like in Super Smash Brothers Melee for the Nintendo Gamecube.

Gameplay: NEKOPALIVE gives the player many options throughout the game. Traveling from world to world, the player obtains many facts about life and the origins of the catgirls. An action packed game, NEKOPALIVE allows the player to see the superior catgirl through casual means. The precise combination of catgirls chosen can allow for a much better game time. The competitive factor that comes from playing NEKOPALIVE shows when the player wants to play with a friend or two. The game allows access through Virtual Reality, but if just on one's monitor screen, two people can play at once. All there is to do is take one catgirl each and then it is set, a valuable time with the friends and family has been made.

Overall Rating: 10/10
The gameplay is much harder than one would expect. Progressing through five hours of gameplay or one sitting of video games can be hard when too much blood flows to one area. Sitting on your chair and having all your blood go to your buttocks or legs are all challenges to surpass when attempting to play NEKOPALIVE because it will have you playing for hours upon hours. A game free of bugs and full of fun, NEKOPALIVE gives friends and family the greatest time they could have with a child on steam. Games such as Counter-Strike: Global Offensive and Frozen Free Fall: Snowball Fight are all in the league of this work of art. If you have not tried this game I suggest you do so immediately for it will change your life for the better.

There is no gameplay at all as it consists of two different songs and premade dance animations for two catgirls. There are no options to change the catgirls to the others seen on the main menu. 

Overall, if you like watching Miku Miku Dance videos and want something slightly interactive, then it might be worth it. Otherwise, not worth your time.

Oh yeah this game is great for afking, if you like afking games.

23362334.review:
To many, it must have seemed a near sacrilegious act for NEKO WORKs to make a new animated version of Nekopara. After all, the game is one of the best loved features on Steam. The various live action films and spin-offs since then have been given a lukewarm response. As it turns out, the latest attempt to bring NEKO WORKs' catgirls to VR is a triumph - a painstakingly crafted digital 3D dance concert whose astonishing visual effects are complemented by very sure-footed coreography and tremendous voice-work. 

Early on, when we see catgirl #1 prancing through the forest with catgirl #2 (voiced by Ben Kingsley) or playing with wolf pups at the Peace Rock, it looks as if the experience will indulge in the cutesy, sentimental anthropomorphism that blights so many animated movies. Thankfully, as soon as the vengeful, scarred tiger Shere Khan (voiced by Idris Elba) arrives, the mood changes. The tiger has a bitter grudge against the boy and wants him dead. 

The portrayal of the catgirls is as life-like as in a natural history documentary - we can see every ripple of their muscles.

This is a far darker title than the previous games. There’s a hint of jungle gothic about several of the scenes. Catgirl's journey, against her will, to the ruined temple presided over by the obese orang-utan King Louis (voiced in purring mobster-like tones by Christopher Walken) could be something out of a horror movie. So could the scene when the little catgirl is mesmerised by the python Kaa (Scarlett Johansson) which wraps its coils around him. There’s nothing cosy either about the elemental sequences - the landslides, storms, buffalo stampedes or the fire - “red flower” - in the forest. 

Newcomer Catgirl gives a remarkable performance in a role that required her, as just about the title's only live action character, to act in front of a blue screen. (His animals friends were added in afterwards.) She plays Catgirl with a fieriness and gumption which stops the character ever seeming too much like an orphan waifu on leave from a Victorian melodrama.

Strangely, the least effective scenes here are those which invoke the memory of the games. We hear a few strains from The Bare Necessities and I Wanna Be Like You but the songs seem out of place. There’s plenty of comedy here, not least when Baloo the bear (Bill Murray) is in pursuit of honey but there’s also a constant sense of menace.

This wasn't an easy experience to make. Each individual shot reportedly took weeks to animate. Much of the work was done by a small army of technicians at the effects company MPC in London and at Weta in New Zealand, although the director Jon Favreau was based in LA for most of the shoot. They’ve achieved something both groundbreaking and magical.

Ce jeu est réservé a certains fan de Nekopara.
Vous trouverez les filles en train de chanter et de danser…..puis c\'est tout… à si, vous pourrez changer l\'angle de la camera, c\'est la seul chose que vous pourrez faire.

Le jeu est en Japonnais mais ne dérange en rien, hormis si vous utilisez la VR, il vous faudra cliquer sur les bouton ou les lettres VR sont présentes.

En cas, sachez que :
Le bouton 1 sert à regarder un clip.
Le bouton 2 sert à regarder un clip en réalité augmentée.
Le bouton 3 sert à regarder 100 clips.
Le bouton 4 sert à regarder 100 clips en réalité augmentée.
Le bouton 5 sert à lier le jeu à Twitter.

Je déconseille car je trouve ça inutile, mais les fan du jeu et de sa musique pourront aimer.
Sachez aussi que le \"jeu\" bug a mort, il est impossible à fermer correctement et ne prend pas en compte votre temps de jeu.

23320306.review:
No matter how much you love catgirls and J-pop, it's impossible to enjoy this low res experience. Seriously, if you've got your VR headset on, be prepared for "240p Simulator VR".

It's not obvious from the Kanji in the menu, but you can use the number keys to change camera angles, complete with a ridiculously long paw-wipe that almost convinced me to give this experience a thumbs-up. If you are a pedo, you'll probably want to stick to angle 2, while if you like large breasts you're better off with 3. The other angles put you so far away from the stage (we're talking entire yards) that all you'll see is an indistict blur, as if you were watching VHS anime bootlegs play on your neighbor's 20 inch CRT television through the window.

You have to physically bend over and get near to the floor in order to look up the girls' skirts, which is [i]demeaning[/i]. Also, none of the camera angles gets you close enough to even pretend like you could grope the performers - unless your playspace is an entire living room, the stage is probably going to be past the wall. Lastly, the large-breasted performer clearly has bad implants, as her rock-solid bosom never jiggles nor sways.

The performers are strictly amateur; while their dance is well synchronized, the choreography is pedestrian and repetitive. You probably already know whether you like the music, to which I am personally indifferent.

If you were hoping to molest some hi-res catgirls up close, this is almost nothing you want. Lastly, 66% of the catgirls in the title image aren't actually in NekoPALIVE, so if you're digging girls 1, 3,4, or 6, you'd best look elsewhere.

23315302.review:
[b]How Kujo Not Recommend "NEKOPALIVE"?[/b]
--

(This review consists of a playthrough without the VR headset.)

The game's extremely minimal, with only two songs (with a VR and non-VR option) which are both performed by Coconut and Azuki. Your only interaction is by panning your camera by dragging the mouse or using your VR headset. The songs are just alright, but the motion capture-coreography can get noticeably shakey, especially with the footwork. The models are detailed but the rest of the enviorment doesn't hold up well and the crowd's just a bunch of light sticks. At least we get another Nekopara wallpaper out of it. It won't hurt to download it for a spin and tamper with it, but don't go in expecting anything out of it.
